title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hamas at Nasser Hospital: Revealing Hidden Weapons and Arresting Key Terrorists”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces continue operations against the terror organization Hamas at Nasser Hospital; the forces found weapons in the hospital and arrested dozens of suspects and over 20 terrorists who participated in the massacre on 7/10

The Commando Brigade, Shayetet 13, and other special forces continue to operate against the terror organization Hamas inside the Nasser Hospital in Khan Yunis. The operation is based on intelligence information that indicates Hamas’s terrorist activity in the hospital.

So far, during the operation, the forces have arrested over 20 terrorists who took part in the murderous massacre on 7/10 and dozens of suspects who have been taken for investigation.

Also, during the searches in the hospital premises, Maglan fighters found launchers, grenades, and other weapons belonging to the terror organization Hamas.

The IDF will continue to operate according to international law against the terror organization Hamas, systematically operating from within hospitals and civilian infrastructures.

Attached is a picture of the weapons found at the hospital compound: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1602202415
